divs: Sighting DetailsI was solo backpacking and over the last couple years something was bothering my camp ocassionally so I set up a gamecam trap and caught this orb coming out of the sky straight for me (pic#1) as I lay in my tent.(pic#2) catches the orb passing over the gamecam and settling on me which is not visible(note the glow of the orb at the top of picture. (pic#3) shows the orb rocketing away between the far pines. 6 seconds between photo #1 and photo #3
trends: There have been 82 other sightings in Washington
There was one other sighting in Washington on or around August 27th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Orb b-lines straight for me in my tent and lands on me and then zips off.
